scripts.sam:build: npm run  build:packagejson && sam build -u --template-file infrastructure/template.yaml
scripts.sam:deploy: . scripts/env.sh && npm run build && sam deploy --template-file infrastructure/template.yaml --stack-name $ASPAN_STACK_NAME --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-bucket $ASPAN_INFRA_BUCKET
scripts.sam:delete: . scripts/env.sh && sam delete --stack-name $ASPAN_STACK_NAME --no-prompts --region $(aws configure get region)
scripts.sam:sync: . scripts/env.sh && npm run  build:packagejson && sam sync -u --template-file infrastructure/template.yaml --stack-name $ASPAN_STACK_NAME --capabilities CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-bucket $ASPAN_INFRA_BUCKET --watch --parameter-overrides ParameterKey=MediBucket,ParameterValue=$ASPAN_MEDIA_BUCKET ParameterKey=ResizerBucket,ParameterValue=$ASPAN_RESIZER_BUCKET
scripts.s3:media:uploadTestData: . scripts/env.sh && aws s3 rm s3://$EPSILON_MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME --recursive && aws s3 sync s3://aspan-test-media s3://$EPSILON_MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME
scripts.pipeline:create: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name $ASPAN_STACK_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://infrastructure/codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$ASPAN_PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$FULL_REPOSITORY_ID ParameterKey=PrincipalOrgID,ParameterValue=$ASPAN_PRINCIPAL_ORG_ID
scripts.pipeline:update: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name $ASPAN_STACK_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://infrastructure/codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$ASPAN_PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$FULL_REPOSITORY_ID ParameterKey=PrincipalOrgID,ParameterValue=$ASPAN_PRINCIPAL_ORG_ID
scripts.fn:invoke: aws lambda invoke --function-name e-fn-resize-main --payload file://request.json --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out response.json
